title: Typestate code doesn't handle const item inside fn
body:
This program results in the stack trace below:

```
fn main() {
    const x: int = 1<<2;
}
```

Moving the const outside of the function, or giving it a value of `4` instead of an expr_binop, causes the problem to vanish.

